name: amos2024ss04-building-information-enhancer
description: Main package file for the AMOS 2024 - Building Information Enhander Project.
author: See repository README

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend:windows: cd backend/src/BIE.DataPipeline/bin && rmdir /s /q build && cd .. && dotnet publish BIE.DataPipeline.csproj -c Release --self-contained true -o ./bin/build
scripts.setup:backend:linux: cd backend/src/BIE.DataPipeline && rm -r ./bin/build && dotnet publish BIE.DataPipeline.csproj -c Release --self-contained true -o ./bin/build
scripts.setup:backend: npm run setup:backend:linux || npm run setup:backend:windows
scripts.deploy:dev:backend: npm run setup:backend && cd backend/src/BIE.DataPipeline && ./bin/build/BIE.DataPipeline ./yaml/test.yaml || bin\build\BIE.DataPipeline yaml\test.yaml
